hostName.description: Host name of the MQTT Connection

port.description: Port Number of the MQTT Connection

keyFormat.description: Format for the CA Certificate and Public and Private Keys

keyAlgorithm.description: Algorithm used for the CA Certificate and Public and Private Keys

CACertificateFileLocation.description: Path and file name of the CA Certificate

publicKeyFileLocation.description: Path and file name of the Public Key

privateKeyFileLocation.description: Path and file name of the Private Key

keepAlive.description: The duration (in seconds) to buffer messages when the connection to MQTT is lost

cleanSession.description: Enables or Disables cleaning session of connection to MQTT

debug.description: Enables or Disables logging of MQTT Debug messages

reconnectDelay.description: The period to attempt reconnection when MQTT connection is lost (in seconds)

reconnectDelayMax.description: Maximum amount of time (in seconds) to attempt to reconnect after MQTT connection is lost (0 indicates continuing to try "forever")

qos.description: Sets the Quality of Service for the MQTT Connection

publishTopic.description: Topic to which to publish messages

subscribeTopic.description: Topic to which to subscribe for messages

enableSecurity.description: Enable or Disable Security for MQTT connection

verifyPeer.description: Enables or Disabled verifying that the server cert is for the server to which the message is being posted

verifyHost.description: Enable or Disable verifiying that host name in the certificate is valid for the host name to which messages are being posted

authenticationType.description: Type of Authentication to use when posting message
